id.description: The unique UUID for this organization

exportToAccounting.description: This would keep the invoice from being feed into the batch process (i.e. not generate an external voucher/payment) but would still move values in the system. This might be defined by the vendor relationship and exposed for override on the invoice.

organizationTypes.description: A list of organization types assigned to this organization

items.description: UUID of an organization type record

aliases.description: The list of aliases for this organization

value.description: The unique name of this alias

addresses.description: The list of addresses for this organization

addressLine1.description: The first line of this address

addressLine2.description: The second line of this address

stateRegion.description: The state or region for this address

zipCode.description: The zip code for this address

isPrimary.description: Used to set this address as primary for the contact

language.description: The language for this organization address

type.description: The type of this phone number

language.description: The language for this organization phone

notes.description: The notes for this organization URL

categories.description: The list of contact categories associated with this organization contact person

inactive.description: Used to indicate that a contact is no longer active

agreements.description: The the list of agreements for this organization

name.description: The unique name of this agreement

discount.description: The discount amount of this agreement

referenceUrl.description: The reference url for this agreement

erpCode.description: The ERP code for this organization

paymentMethod.description: The payment method for this organization

accessProvider.description: The access provider for this organization

governmental.description: The setting to mark this organization as governmental

licensor.description: The setting to mark this organization as a licensor

materialSupplier.description: The setting to mark this organization as a material supplier

vendorCurrencies.description: The list of currencies used by this organization

claimingInterval.description: The claim interval for this organization

discountPercent.description: The discount percentage for this organization

expectedActivationInterval.description: The expected activation interval (in days) for this organization

expectedInvoiceInterval.description: The expected invoice interval (in days) for this organization

renewalActivationInterval.description: The revewal activation interval (in days) for this organization

subscriptionInterval.description: The subscription interval (in days) for this organization

expectedReceiptInterval.description: The receipt interval (in days) for this organization

taxId.description: The tax ID for this organization

liableForVat.description: The setting to mark this organization liable to collect VAT

taxPercentage.description: The tax percentage value for this organization

edi.description: The EDI object for this organization (only applicable when isVendor is true)

vendorEdiCode.description: The organization code for this EDI

vendorEdiType.description: The organization type for this EDI

libEdiCode.description: The library code for this EDI

libEdiType.description: The library type for this EDI

prorateTax.description: The setting to prorate tax for this EDI

prorateFees.description: The setting to prorate fees for this EDI

ediNamingConvention.description: The naming convention for this EDI

sendAcctNum.description: The setting to send the account number for this EDI

supportOrder.description: The setting to support order for this EDI

supportInvoice.description: The setting to support invoice for this EDI

ediFtp.description: The FTP object for this EDI

ftpFormat.description: The FTP format for this EDI

serverAddress.description: The server address for this EDI

username.description: The login username for this EDI

password.description: The login password for this EDI

ftpMode.description: The FTP mode for this EDI

ftpConnMode.description: The FTP connection mode for this EDI

orderDirectory.description: The order directory for this EDI

invoiceDirectory.description: The invoice directory for this EDI

ediJob.description: The job object for this EDI

scheduleEdi.description: Activate the schedule for this EDI job

schedulingDate.description: The date (MM/DD/YYYY) for this EDI job to start running

time.description: The time (h:mm A) for this EDI job

isMonday.description: The setting to run this EDI job on Mondays

isTuesday.description: The setting to run this EDI job on Tuesdays

isWednesday.description: The setting to run this EDI job on Wednesdays

isThursday.description: The setting to run this EDI job on Thursdays

isFriday.description: The setting to run this EDI job on Fridays

isSaturday.description: The setting to run this EDI job on Saturdays

isSunday.description: The setting to run this EDI job on Sundays

sendToEmails.description: The comma delimited list of email addresses to notify when this EDI job runs

notifyAllEdi.description: The setting to notify all receivers when this EDI job runs

notifyInvoiceOnly.description: The setting to notify only the invoice receiver when this EDI job runs

notifyErrorOnly.description: The setting to notiry on the error receiver when this EDI job runs

schedulingNotes.description: The schedule notes for this EDI job

interfaces.description: The list of interfaces assigned to this organization

id.description: The unique id of this interface

available.description: The availability setting for this interface

deliveryMethod.description: The delivery method for this interface

statisticsFormat.description: The format of the statistics for this interface

locallyStored.description: The locally stored location of this interface

onlineLocation.description: The online location for this interface

statisticsNotes.description: The notes regarding the statistics for this interface

id.description: The unique id of this interface credential

username.description: The login username for this interface

password.description: The login password for this interface

interfaceId.description: The unique id of the associated interface

accounts.description: The list of accounts for this organization

name.description: The unique name of this account

accountNo.description: The unique number of this account

appSystemNo.description: The unique name of this group

paymentMethod.description: The method of payment for this account

contactInfo.description: The contact info for the account

libraryCode.description: The library code for this account

libraryEdiCode.description: The EDI code for this account

acqUnitIds.description: Acquisition unit UUIDs associated with this organizations account

isVendor.description: Used to indicate that this organization is also a vendor

sanCode.description: The SAN code for this organization address

changelogs.description: The list of changes applied to this organization

timestamp.description: The timestamp for when the change occurred

acqUnitIds.description: Acquisition unit UUIDs associated with this organization

tags.description: arbitrary tags associated with this organization
